data.message: Em I no u can't write back but I wanted to thank u from the bottom my heart u save me more then once with ur music and with ur good heart I feel ur love I still really lost I just come out off hospital for my health and I had no one there but I put ur music on and I feel u was there holding my hand not to be afraid knowing I could not breathe I put ur songs on and that help me so thank u again
